amendment.description: Amendment requires the President of the United States to convey to Congress the details of any proposed deals with the Russian Federation concerning the missile defense or nuclear arms of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to require the President of the United States to convey to Congress the details of any proposed deals with the Russian Federation concerning the missile defense or nuclear arms of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 182 (Roll no. 229).
